ISSUE.TITLE: change: disables logging of errors about not found files into error_log for admin api.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When the user opens an independent service port for the dashboard, the dashboard may access some non-existing files (such as ICO). These not found logs are meaningless. We can disable these error logs by default. we can add the directive here: https://github.com/apache/incubator-apisix/blob/master/bin/apisix#L248 ``` log_not_found off; ``` here is the directive about `log_not_found`: http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_core_module.html#log_not_found

COMMIT.MESSAGE: change: disables logging of errors about not found files into error_log for admin api. Fix #1168
change: disables logging of errors about not found files into error_log for admin api. Fix #1168
